        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 if (current.isActionAborted()) return;
 if ( current.duration.changes() ) {
  if ( current.getValue("duration") == "1970-01-01 00:00:00" ) {
   current.milestone = true;
   gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("The task has been converted to a milestone"));
  }
  else {
   current.key_milestone = false;
   current.milestone = false;
  }
 }
 else if ( current.milestone.changes() ) {
  if ( current.milestone == true ){
   current.setValue("duration", "1970-01-01 00:00:00");
      if(current.end_date.changes())
     current.setValue("end_date", current.getValue("start_date"));
  }
  else {
   current.key_milestone = false;
   if (current.getValue("duration") == "1970-01-01 00:00:00") 
    current.setValue("duration", "1970-01-02 00:00:00");   
  }
 }
 else if ( current.key_milestone.changes() ) {
  if ( current.key_milestone == true ) {
   current.setValue("duration", "1970-01-01 00:00:00");
   if(current.end_date.changes())
     current.setValue("end_date", current.getValue("start_date"));
   current.milestone = true;
  }
 }
})(current, previous);]]></script>
